entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • CollectionView SelectedItemTemplate #15534
  • MAUI Windows app launches as white screen and hangs #15533
  • Vision OS support #15531
  • [Windows] Review currently failing Windows tests #15530
    .NET 8
  • [Windows] Fix CollectionView tests that have regressed #15529
    .NET 8
  • Maui on harmony os #15526
  • CreateRendererWithContext working in xamarin not working in MAUI #15525
  • Text entry border disappear when changing to/from dark mode in Android #15524
  • Memory Leak issue in MAUI #15523
  • Sometimes it's a blank space in Maui Blazor APP when open the program #15522
    Backlog
  • [regression/8.0.0-preview.4.8333] [MAUI] New Recipe page layout is abnormal in Simulator/Emulator(API -33) landscape mode #15521
  • Blazor hybrid: No content in Webbrowser after some time in background #15520
  • [MAUI] Card will be truncated after resizing the window to be smaller and larger on Windows and MacCatalyst target #15519

Closed

  • The Blazor MAUI app crashes on Windows when an InputFile is used #15224
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Placing a slider in a grid column with a Width="*" and non-zero Margin causes a LayoutCycleException #10980
    Backlog
  • When the flow direction is changed in ScrollView as RTL, the scrolling direction remains unchanged in iOS and macOS #11026
    Backlog
  • Shell.TabBarIsVisible="False" is ignored #11151
    Backlog
  • White screen #15347
  • Deployment error when debugging on iOS Local Device: "Could not find a part of the path..." #15480
  • How to mix RTL and LTR characters in the same string when using collection view source. #15516
  • When using a barcode scanner, the Entry.Completed event is fired with empty Text #10663
    .NET 8 Planning
  • adding net7.0 tfm to project with handlers crashes #15314

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix incorrect calculation of expansion size when *s have different scalars #15532
  • Implement rate for TextToSpeech on supported platforms #15528
    area/essentials 🍞, community ✨
  • Skip tests currently having issues on WinUI #15527
    area/infrastructure 🏗️

Updated

  • Set the SafeAreaInset Property with updated value #15512
    area/layout 🔲, platform/iOS 🍎
  • feat: adding IWindowCreator #14921
    community ✨
  • [Windows/macOS] Implement menu key accelerators #14740
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/desktop 🖥️, control-menubar
  • Remove HandlerImpl folder and put partial files together #14339
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [iOS] Avoid crash setting custom icon in SearchHandler #14634
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/shell 🐢
  • [Android] Allow to scroll horizontal WebView content inside TabbedPage #14320
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-webview
  • Add SwipeItems to LogicalChildren #13864
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-swipeview
  • Ensure "text boxes" preserve cursor location #15099
    area/controls 🎮, control-entry
  • Workaround WinUI bug with adding/removing flyouts #14985
    area/controls 🎮, control-flyout
  • Remove netstandard2.1 #15355
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, do-not-merge, area/architecture
  • Default ANDROID_SDK_ROOT if not set #15169
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Android: recreate activity on dark mode change #15449
    community ✨
  • Bump Microsoft.NET.Test.Sdk from 17.6.1 to 17.6.2 #15502
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
